bibl.title: The Late Antique Economy: Primary and Secondary Production.
bibl.note: Primary production: Climate change; - Stock raising. - Wine and oil production; - Fishing; - Extraction. - Secondary production: Glass; - Pilgrim flasks; - Stone; - Textiles. - Post-Roman economies: legacy into the Middle Ages.

bibl.title: Local Economies? Production and Exchange of Inland Regions in Late Antiquity

bibl.seg: Andrea Zerbini, The Late Antique Economy: Primary and Secondary Production.
Luke Lavan (ed.), Local Economies? Production and Exchange of Inland Regions in Late Antiquity = Late Antique Archaeology. 10 (Leiden, 2015) pp. 61-81.

Primary production: Climate change; - Stock raising. - Wine and oil production; - Fishing; - Extraction. - Secondary production: Glass; - Pilgrim flasks; - Stone; - Textiles. - Post-Roman economies: legacy into the Middle Ages.
